about_the_game: A seemingly simple but actually very strategic game. The terrible undead army will invade the orc homeland. The unyielding Orc unite the tribe. You can send troops to resist or attack. Of course, there is no lack of the hero aura of the protagonist swordsman. You can use heroes to reverse the defeat. A novel game is about to land on the PC platform,. Different troops have different skills. Using the skills of barbarian cattle reasonably can make the boss dizzy. Different enemies and different games are composed of five different game modes. Thousands of enemies are on the way, and the sword master's great move, Wan Jian Guizong, is ready. A wonderful battle is waiting for you to experience.
detailed_description: A seemingly simple but actually very strategic game. The terrible undead army will invade the orc homeland. The unyielding Orc unite the tribe. You can send troops to resist or attack. Of course, there is no lack of the hero aura of the protagonist swordsman. You can use heroes to reverse the defeat. A novel game is about to land on the PC platform,. Different troops have different skills. Using the skills of barbarian cattle reasonably can make the boss dizzy. Different enemies and different games are composed of five different game modes. Thousands of enemies are on the way, and the sword master's great move, Wan Jian Guizong, is ready. A wonderful battle is waiting for you to experience.

name: OrcVsUndead
short_description: The Lich King has awakened that the sword Saint living in seclusion in Kalimdor can understand the meaning of the sword under the guidance of the witch, unite the elves and lead the orcs to defeat the devil and save the world!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
